title: Sign Up for the Deals & Events E-mail Newsletter | Acupuncture Today
cleaned_text: Low back pain is defined as pain the posterior superior iliac spine (PSIS), and it can be acute or chronic, localized or radiating. It is a common ailment for adults in the United States, with a lifetime prevalence as high as 65-80%. Whether or not an MRI is available to provide definitive knowledge of a structural issue, acupuncture can be an effective treatment for low back pain.| Digital Exclusive AT Deals & Events E-mail Newsletter [Click Here](https://www2.acupuncturetoday.com/deals_events) for the latest version of this newsletter online. [Click Here](/newsletters/at-deals-events-unsubscribe) to unsubscribe from Deals & Events. A free service to all doctors and students of acupuncture and Oriental medicine, Acupuncture Today Deals & Events offers special discounts (a minimum of 10%) on select products, services, select acupuncture seminars and events for ATs.
